pizzerias.name: Pizzium
pizzerias.specialty: Honolulu (San Marzano tomatoes, fior di latte, pineapple, cooked ham)
pizzerias.description: A popular chain focused on regional Italian pizzas, Pizzium offers a special Honolulu pizza for international guests, made with high-quality pineapple and premium ham.

pizzerias.name: Dry Milano
pizzerias.specialty: Tropical (caramelized pineapple, 24-month aged prosciutto, fior di latte, basil)
pizzerias.description: A contemporary pizzeria and cocktail bar that merges gourmet pizza with mixology. Their upscale take on pineapple pizza features caramelized fruit and aged prosciutto.

pizzerias.name: Gino Sorbillo Lievito Madre
pizzerias.address: Largo Corsia dei Servi, 11, 20122 Milano MI
pizzerias.specialty: Ananas e Prosciutto (fresh pineapple, prosciutto cotto, buffalo mozzarella, basil)
pizzerias.description: Legendary Neapolitan pizzaiolo Gino Sorbillo's Milan outpost near the Duomo. Known for fluffy, soft-centered Neapolitan pizzas, they offer an elevated Hawaiian for international guests.

pizzerias.name: Berberè
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Gourmet (organic pineapple, ham, fior di latte, organic sourdough base)
pizzerias.description: Artisanal pizzeria focusing on organic ingredients and sourdough that rises for at least 24 hours. Their Hawaiian pizza uses organic pineapple and high-welfare meats.

pizzerias.name: Spontini
pizzerias.specialty: Trancio Ananas (thick-slice pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, pineapple)
pizzerias.description: Historic Milanese chain known for their large, thick-slice pizza by the cut. Their Hawaiian version comes on their signature fluffy base.

pizzerias.name: Pizzeria Assaje
pizzerias.address: Via Privata della Braida, 5, 20122 Milano MI
pizzerias.specialty: Esotica (San Marzano tomatoes, fior di latte, pineapple, prosciutto cotto, basil)
pizzerias.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizzeria with an open wood-fired oven. They reluctantly added a Hawaiian pizza to please international clientele but execute it with high-quality ingredients.

pizzerias.name: Da Zero Milano
pizzerias.specialty: Tropicale (San Marzano DOP, fior di latte, prosciutto cotto, fresh pineapple)
pizzerias.description: Da Zero focuses on using ingredients from Cilento, Campania. Their Hawaiian pizza maintains their commitment to quality with fresh pineapple and premium ham.

pizzerias.name: Fresco & Cimmino
pizzerias.specialty: Pizza Surf (fior di latte, prosciutto cotto, pineapple, rosemary, black pepper)
pizzerias.description: Neapolitan pizzeria blending tradition with innovation. Their Hawaiian variation adds rosemary and black pepper for an Italian twist on the international favorite.

pizzerias.name: Crazy Pizza Milano
pizzerias.specialty: Crazy Hawaiian (ultra-thin crust, San Marzano sauce, mozzarella, premium ham, fresh pineapple)
pizzerias.description: Trendy, upscale pizzeria with ultra-thin, yeast-free crusts. Their extravagant take on Hawaiian pizza uses premium ingredients in a stylish setting.

pizzerias.name: Cocciuto
pizzerias.specialty: Waikiki (tomato sauce, mozzarella, caramelized pineapple, smoked ham, jalapeños)
pizzerias.description: Contemporary pizzeria in the Tortona design district that specializes in creative recipes. Their Hawaiian pizza gets a spicy kick from jalapeños.

disclaimer: Information may have changed since the last update. Pineapple on pizza remains controversial in Italy, so availability may vary. Please check with the establishments directly for the most current menu offerings and details.
